Reviews.Title: “Very Friendly Staff, Average Rooms”
Reviews.Author: ousoonergirl1
Reviews.Content: rated hotel 3 torn stayed branson extremely busy weekend memorial day weekend finding prior reservations difficult time checked thankful staff friendly helpful enjoyed talking property ok walkways dirty swimming pool nice sit read book enjoy outdoors agree posts lighting terrible beds lumpy mattresses definitely changed carpet dirty bathrooms average guess price 5400 night ok stayed worse particular traveling budget recommend

Reviews.Content: stayed 2012 home bedbug bites lighting poor read book night breakfast terrible witha sugar bring own called tell manager bedbug told apology stay recommend mattresses completely worn
